name: Creative Market Labs, Inc.
description: Operator of an online design marketplace intended to sell ready-to-use design content from independent creators around the world. The company's marketplace assists people to bring their creative projects to life with ready-to-use design assets like fonts, graphics, photos and more, enabling designers to buy and sell their works across the web and turn passion into opportunity.
one_liner: Operator of an online design marketplace intended to sell ready-to-use design content from independent creators around the world. The company's marketplace assists people to bring their creative projects to life with ready-to-use design assets like fonts, graphics, photos and more, enabling designers to buy and sell their works across the web and turn passion into opportunity.
